title: Error switching backend for matplotlib to Notebook
body:
**Describe the bug**
We are following the steps as described here:
https://github.com/AlexEMG/DeepLabCut/blob/master/examples/Demo_labeledexample_MouseReaching.ipynb

Under "Plot the trajectories of the analyzed Videos", there is the following command "
%matplotlib Notebook" to switch the Backend to Notebook.

This produces the following Output:

**To Reproduce**

```
In [9]: %matplotlib notebook
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
UnknownBackend                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-10-75fe7579b448> in <module>
----> 1 get_ipython().run_line_magic('matplotlib', 'Notebook')

~\Anaconda3\envs\deep\lib\site-packages\IPython\core\interactiveshell.py in run_line_magic(self, magic_name, line, _stack_depth)
   2312                 kwargs['local_ns'] = sys._getframe(stack_depth).f_locals
   2313             with self.builtin_trap:
-> 2314                 result = fn(*args, **kwargs)
   2315             return result
   2316

<C:\Users\DLC\Anaconda3\envs\deep\lib\site-packages\decorator.py:decorator-gen-109> in matplotlib(self, line)

~\Anaconda3\envs\deep\lib\site-packages\IPython\core\magic.py in <lambda>(f, *a, **k)
    185     # but it's overkill for just that one bit of state.
    186     def magic_deco(arg):
--> 187         call = lambda f, *a, **k: f(*a, **k)
    188
    189         if callable(arg):

~\Anaconda3\envs\deep\lib\site-packages\IPython\core\magics\pylab.py in matplotlib(self, line)
     97             print("Available matplotlib backends: %s" % backends_list)
     98         else:
---> 99             gui, backend = self.shell.enable_matplotlib(args.gui.lower() if isinstance(args.gui, str) else args.gui)
    100             self._show_matplotlib_backend(args.gui, backend)
    101

~\Anaconda3\envs\deep\lib\site-packages\IPython\core\interactiveshell.py in enable_matplotlib(self, gui)
   3417         # Now we must activate the gui pylab wants to use, and fix %run to take
   3418         # plot updates into account
-> 3419         self.enable_gui(gui)
   3420         self.magics_manager.registry['ExecutionMagics'].default_runner = \
   3421             pt.mpl_runner(self.safe_execfile)

~\Anaconda3\envs\deep\lib\site-packages\IPython\terminal\interactiveshell.py in enable_gui(self, gui)
    517         if gui:
    518             self.active_eventloop, self._inputhook =\
--> 519                 get_inputhook_name_and_func(gui)
    520         else:
    521             self.active_eventloop = self._inputhook = None

~\Anaconda3\envs\deep\lib\site-packages\IPython\terminal\pt_inputhooks\__init__.py in get_inputhook_name_and_func(gui)
     36
     37     if gui not in backends:
---> 38         raise UnknownBackend(gui)
     39
     40     if gui in aliases:

UnknownBackend: No event loop integration for 'notebook'. Supported event loops are: qt, qt4, qt5, gtk, gtk2, gtk3, tk, wx, pyglet, glut, osx
```

 - DeepLabCut Version 2.1

**Additional context**
Windows 10
